channel.title: Help with allstar
channel.description:
Hi im having problems with allstar
1. how would i make an npc in say... fally castle
2.how can i make that npc talk or make it a shop
3.allstar wont let me change what the npcs say i used to be able to but now i cant i change it to w/e but it wont work i tried removing all the data from my characters saved games etc to clear space if it help when i compile i get 3 errors but theyre for the admin item spot im using moparscape client 3.2 anyhelps appreciated thanks!
